alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides and east central Vernon Parishes through 300 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Otis, or near Hineston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenmora, Hineston, Lecompte, Otis, Elmer, Leander, Sieper, Gardner, Calcasieu, Woodworth, Forest Hill, Mcnary and Union Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 65 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Louisiana.
